neuralDNS.title: Neural DNS
neuralDNS.description: AI-powered domain routing with predictive caching. Self-learning algorithms optimize your traffic in real-time.

quantumShield.title: Quantum Shield
quantumShield.description: Post-quantum cryptographic protection. Your domains are secured against future computing threats.

meshNetwork.title: Mesh Network
meshNetwork.description: Decentralized infrastructure across 500+ nodes. Zero single points of failure.

edgeCompute.title: Edge Compute
edgeCompute.description: Process domain logic at the edge. Serverless functions with sub-millisecond cold starts.
